text: The Thelephoraceae are a family of fungi in the order Thelephorales. This grouping of mushrooms is commonly known as the "leathery earthfans". ==Genera== The family includes the following eight genera: * Amaurodon * Hypochnus * Lenzitopsis * Polyozellus * Pseudotomentella * Skepperia * Thelephora * Tomentella ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Thelephorales Category:Basidiomycota families
title: Thelephoraceae
